SEARCH
Package SC2002.Project.control

Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
SC2002.Project.control.ApplicationController
public class ApplicationController extends Object
Centralized controller for managing the entire BTO application lifecycle.

This controller handles all operations related to BTO applications:

  • Creating new applications
  • Managing application status transitions
  • Processing withdrawal requests
  • Querying applications by various criteria
  • Coordinating with project availability

Fulfills the following requirements:

  • Allows applicants to apply for a single project at a time
  • Manages application status transitions (pending â†’ successful/unsuccessful/withdrawn)
  • Supports manager approval/rejection of applications
  • Supports flat booking for successful applications
  • Handles withdrawal requests at various stages
  • Updates flat availability based on application status changes

  • Method Details

    • createApplication

      public BTOApplication createApplication(Applicant applicant, Project project, String flatType)
      Creates a new application for an applicant on a project with a specified flat type. This fulfills the requirement that applicants can apply for projects, with appropriate validation of eligibility to be done at the UI level.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the application
      project - The project being applied for
      flatType - The type of flat being requested (e.g., "2-ROOM")
      Returns:
      The newly created BTOApplication, or null if creation failed

    • findById

      public BTOApplication findById(int id)
      Finds an application by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the application to find
      Returns:
      The application with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • listApplicationsForProject

      public List<BTOApplication> listApplicationsForProject(int projectId)
      Lists all applications submitted for a given project. This supports the requirement for managers to view applications for their managed projects.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      A list of applications for the specified project

    • listApplicationsByApplicant

      public List<BTOApplication> listApplicationsByApplicant(int applicantId)
      Lists all applications submitted by a given applicant. This supports the requirement for applicants to view their application status.
      Parameters:
      applicantId - The ID of the applicant
      Returns:
      A list of applications from the specified applicant

    • changeStatus

      public boolean changeStatus(int applicationId, ApplicationStatus newStatus)
      Changes the status of an existing application. Supports various status transitions and manages flat availability:
      • PENDINGâ†’SUCCESS: Reserves a flat unit (decreases available count)
      • PENDINGâ†’REJECTED: Releases applicant to apply again
      • SUCCESSâ†’BOOKED: Confirms flat booking
      • PENDINGâ†’WITHDRAWN: Releases applicant to apply again
      • SUCCESSâ†’WITHDRAWN: Returns flat to available pool (increases available count)
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to update
      newStatus - The desired new status
      Returns:
      True if the transition was performed, false otherwise

    • approveApplication

      public boolean approveApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Approves a pending application. Fulfills the requirement for managers to approve applicant applications. Checks for flat availability before approval.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to approve
      Returns:
      True if successful, false otherwise

    • rejectApplication

      public boolean rejectApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Rejects a pending application. Fulfills the requirement for managers to reject applicant applications.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to reject
      Returns:
      True if successful, false otherwise

    • withdrawApplication

      public boolean withdrawApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Sets a pending or approved application status to withdrawn. Fulfills the requirement for approving withdrawal requests. Returns flat units to the available pool if the application was approved.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to withdraw
      Returns:
      True if successful, false otherwise

    • bookApplication

      public boolean bookApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Requests booking for an approved application. Fulfills the requirement that successful applicants can book a flat.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to book
      Returns:
      True if successful, false otherwise

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal(BTOApplication application)
      Requests withdrawal for an application. Fulfills the requirement that applicants can request withdrawal before/after flat booking. Note: This does not change flat counts, it only sets the withdrawal request flag which will be processed by a manager.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to request withdrawal for
      Returns:
      True if successful, false otherwise

    • confirmWithdrawalRequest

      public boolean confirmWithdrawalRequest(BTOApplication application)
      Confirms a withdrawal request by a manager. Fulfills the requirement for managers to approve withdrawal requests. This is when flat counts are updated for successful applications.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to confirm withdrawal for
      Returns:
      True if successful, false otherwise

    • rejectWithdrawalRequest

      public boolean rejectWithdrawalRequest(BTOApplication application)
      Rejects a withdrawal request. Fulfills the requirement for managers to reject withdrawal requests.
      Parameters:
      application - The application to reject withdrawal for
      Returns:
      True if successful, false otherwise

    • getWithdrawalRequests

      public List<BTOApplication> getWithdrawalRequests()
      Gets all applications with pending withdrawal requests. Helps managers view and process withdrawal requests.
      Returns:
      List of applications with withdrawal requests

    • getPendingApplications

      public List<BTOApplication> getPendingApplications()
      Gets all pending applications. Helps managers view and process applications waiting for approval.
      Returns:
      List of pending applications

    • getApplicationsByManager

      public List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsByManager(int managerId)
      Gets all applications for projects managed by a specific manager. Fulfills the requirement for managers to view applications for their projects.
      Parameters:
      managerId - The ID of the manager
      Returns:
      List of applications for projects managed by the specified manager
